detectors.description:

detectors.description:

	External calls:
	- tokenContract.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amount) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/33/3333328EEEe633Db5c60C096EdEc1Fde25FA7773_Vesting.sol#212)
